title: Jessica Ridgeway // 20
description:
In October 2012, a 10-year-old girl disappears on her way to school in Westminster, Colorado. Investigators are starting to lose hope until a mother makes a phone call and the gruesome details come to light. This is the case of Jessica Ridgeway.
**GOING WEST DOES NOT OWN ANY OF THE NEWS CLIPS PRESENTED**
911 call: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cHdmpoobW2g
